Verses: 1 isravel Puththirar Saabaththeedaanadhile Dhurogampanninaargal; Eppadiyenil, Yoodhaakoththiraththu Seraakudaiya Kumaaranaana Sapthiyin Magan Karmeekku Pirandha Aakaan Enbavan, Saabaththeedaanadhile Siladhai Eduththukkondaan; Aagaiyaal Isravel Puththirarmel Karththarudaiya Kobam Moondadhu.

2 yosuvaa Erigovilirundhu Beththelukku Kizhakkilulla Peththaaven Sameebaththilirukkira Aayipattanaththukku Pogumbadi Aatkalai Anuppi: Neengal Poi, Andha Naattai Vevupaarungal Endraan; Andha Manushar Poi; Aayiyai Vevupaarththu,

3 yosuvaavinidaththil Thirumbivandhu, Avanai Nokki: Janangal Ellaarum Pogavendiyadhillai; Erakkuraiya Irandaayiram Moovaayiramper Poi, Aayiyai Muriya Adikkalaam; Ellaa Janangalaiyum Ange Pogumbadi Varuththappaduththavendiyadhillai; Avargal Konjamperdhaan Endraargal.
4 appadiye Janangalil Erakkuraiya Moovaayiramper Avvidaththirku Ponaargal; Aanaalum Avargal Aayiyin Manusharukku Munbaaga Murindhodinaargal.

5 aayiyin Manushar Avargalil Erakkuraiya Muppaththaaruperai Vettippottaargal; Pattanavaasalin Veli Thuvakki Chepaareemmattum Avargalai Thuraththi, Malaiyirakkaththile Avargalai Vettinaargal; Janangalin Irudhayam Karaindhu Thanneeraaippoyitru.

6 appozhudhu Yosuvaa Than Vasthirangalai Kizhiththukkondu, Avanum Isravelin Moopparum Saayangaalamattum Karththarin Pettikku Munbaaga Tharaiyile Muganguppura Vizhundhu, Thangal Thalaigalinmel Puzhudhiyai Pottukkondu Kidandhaargal.

7 yosuvaa: Aa, Karththaraagiya Aandavare, Engalai Azhikkumbadi Emoriyar Kaigalil Oppukkoduppadharkaagavaa Dhevareer Indha Janaththai Yordhaanai Kadakkappannineer? Naangal Yordhaanukku Appuraththil Manaththirupthiyaaga Irundhuvittomaanaal Nalamaayirukkum.
8 aa, Aandavare, Isravelar Thangal Saththurukkalukku Mudhugai Kaattinaargal; Ippozhudhu Naan Enna Solluven.

9 kaanaaniyarum Dhesaththu Kudikal Yaavarum Idhaikkettu, Engalai Valaindhukondu, Engal Perai Boomiyiliraadhabadikku Veratruppogappannuvaargale; Appozhudhu Umadhu Magaththaana Naamaththukku Enna Seyveer Endraan.
10 appozhudhu Karththar Yosuvaavai Nokki: Ezhundhiru, Nee Ippadi Muganguppura Vizhundhu Kidakkiradhu Enna?

11 isravelar Paavancheydhaargal; Naan Avargalukku Kattalaiyitta En Udanbadikkaiyai Meerinaargal; Saapaththeedaanadhil Eduththukkondadhum, Kalavuseydhadhum Vanjiththadhum, Thangal Pandambaadigalukkulle Vaiththadhum Unde.

12 aadhalaal Isravel Puththirar Thangal Saththurukkalukku Munbaaga Nirka Koodaamal, Thangal Saththurukkalukku Mudhugai Kaattinaargal; Avargal Saapaththeedaanaargal; Neengal Saapaththeedaanadhai Ungal Naduvilirundhu Nikkirakampannaavittaal, Ini Ungalode Iren.

13 ezhundhiru, Nee Janangalai Parisuththampanni Sollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal: Naalaiyadhinaththukku Ungalai Parisuththampannikkollungal; Isravelare, Saabaththeedaanadhu Ungal Naduve Irukkiradhu; Neengal Saabaththeetaanadhai Ungal Naduvilirundhu Vilakkaadhirukkumattum, Neengal Ungal Saththurukkalukku Munbaaga Nirkakkoodaadhu Endru Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Karththar Sollugiraar.

14 kaalaiyile Neengal Koththiram Koththiramaai Varavendum; Appozhudhu Karththarkurikkira Koththiram Vamsam Vamsamaaga Varavendum; Karththar Kurikkira Vamsam Kudumbam Kudumbamaaga Varavendum; Karththar Kurikkira Kudumbam Perperaaga Varavendum Endru Sol.

15 appozhudhu Saabaththeedaanadhai Eduththavanaai Kandupidikkappadugiravan, Karththarinudanbadikkaiyai Meeri, Isravelile Madhikedaana Kaariyaththai Seydhabadiyinaal, Avanum Avanukkulla Yaavum Akkiniyil Sutterikkappadakkadavadhu Endraar.
16 yosuvaa Adhikaalame Ezhundhirundhu, Isravelarai Koththiram Koththiramaaga Varappanninaan; Appozhudhu, Yoodhaavin Koththiram Kurikkappattadhu.
17 avan Yoodhaavin Vamsangalai Varappanninapodhu, Seraakiyarin Vamsam Kurikkappattadhu; Avan Seraakiyarin Vamsaththai Perperaaga Varappanninapodhu, Sapdhi Kurikkappattaan.
18 avan Veettaarai Avan Perperaaga Varappanninapodhu, Yoodhaa Koththiraththu Cheraakin Kumaaranaagiya Sapdhikku Pirandha Karmeeyin Magan Aakaan Kurikkappattaan.

19 appozhudhu Yosuvaa Aakaanai Nokki: Magane, Nee Ippozhudhu Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Karththarai Magimaippaduththu, Avarukku Munbaaga Arikkaipanni, Nee Seydhadhai Enakku Sollu; Adhai Enakku Olikkaadhe Endraan.
20 appozhudhu Aakaan Yosuvaavukku Piradhiyuththaramaaga; Meyyaagave Naan Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Karththarukku Virodhamaaga Paavanjeydhen.

21 kollaiyile Nerththiyaana Oru Paapiloniya Saalvaiyaiyum, Irunooru Vellichchekkalaiyum, Aimbadhu Sekkal Niraiyaana Oru Ponpaalaththaiyum Naan Kandu, Avaigalai Ichchiththu Eduththukkonden; Idho, Avaigal En Koodaaraththin Maththiyil Boomikkul Pudhaiththirukkiradhu, Velli Adhin Adiyilirukkiradhu Endraan.
22 udane Yosuvaa Aatkalai Anuppinaan; Avargal Koodaaraththukku Odinaargal; Avanudaiya Koodaaraththil Adhu Pudhaindhirundhadhu, Velliyum Adhinkeezh Irundhadhu.
23 avaigalai Koodaaraththin Maththiyilirundhu Eduththu Yosuvaavinidaththilum Isravel Puththirar Ellaaridaththilum Konduvandhu, Karththarudaiya Samugaththil Vaiththaargal.

24 appozhudhu Yosuvaavum Isravelarellaarungooda Cheraakin Puththiranaagiya Aakaanaiyum, Andha Velliyaiyum Saalvaiyaiyum Ponpaalaththaiyum, Avan Kumaararaiyum Kumaaraththigalaiyum, Avan Maadugalaiyum Kazhudhaigalaiyum Aadugalaiyum, Avan Koodaaraththaiyum, Avanukkulla Yaavaiyum Eduththu, Aakor Pallaththaakkukku Konduponaargal.

25 ange Yosuvaa: Nee Engalai Kalangappanninadhu Enna? Indru Karththar Unnai Kalangappannuvaar Endraan; Appozhudhu Isravelarellaarum Avanmel Kallerindhu, Avaigalai Akkiniyil Sutteriththu, Karkalinaal Moodi;

26 avanmel Innaalvaraikkum Irukkira Periya Karkuviyalai Kuviththaargal; Ippadiye Karththar Thamadhu Kobaththin Ukkiraththaivittu Maarinaar; Aagaiyaal Avvidam Innaalvaraikkum Aakor Pallaththaakku Ennappadum.
